citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Two skylights above the gibbon pens have damaged, torn and dirty screens. Without intact screens, insect vermin may
enter the pen when skylights are opened, or the excessive buildup of debris or ripped pieces of screens may fall into the
pens and present an ingestion hazard, possibly leading to illness. The facility must ensure that the area above the pens is
kept in good repair to facilitate adequate housekeeping to maintain the animals in good health.
Correct by 3/31/2025

The metal interior of the door to the agouti's den was damaged and had a sharp, curled up bottom edge.
The wooden wagon in the jaguar's enclosure had a rusted, deteriorating wheel support apparatus.
Sharp edges and rusted metal may be at risk of causing injury and cannot be adequately cleaned.
The facility must ensure that the enclosures are kept in good repair to prevent risks to animal welfare.
Correct agouti pen by 03/31/2025 and jaguar pen by 04/26/2025.

The ceiling in the Sierra Madre kitchen had dried old food splashed on it, and and the caulking around the sink was
damaged, had a dark buildup, and had separated from the wall in some spots. Maintenance of surfaces in kitchens is
important to prevent growth of molds and other contaminants, and facilitates proper practices for sanitation to facilitate
husbandry practices needed to support animal welfare. The facility must ensure housekeeping is sufficient to maintain
cleanliness in the kitchen area.
Correct by 03/31/2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.84(c) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
Two skylights above the gibbon pens have damaged, torn and dirty screens. Without intact screens, insect vermin may 
enter the pen when skylights are opened, or the excessive buildup of debris or ripped pieces of screens may fall into the 
pens and present an ingestion hazard, possibly leading to illness. The facility must ensure that the area above the pens is 
kept in good repair to facilitate adequate housekeeping to maintain the animals in good health. 
 
Correct by 3/31/2025 
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The metal interior of the door to the agouti's den was damaged and had a sharp, curled up bottom edge.  
The wooden wagon in the jaguar's enclosure had a rusted, deteriorating wheel support apparatus.  
Sharp edges and rusted metal may be at risk of causing injury and cannot be adequately cleaned. 
The facility must ensure that the enclosures are kept in good repair to prevent risks to animal welfare. 
 
Correct agouti pen by 03/31/2025 and jaguar pen by 04/26/2025. 
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
The ceiling in the Sierra Madre kitchen had dried old food splashed on it, and and the caulking around the sink was 
damaged, had a dark buildup, and had separated from the wall in some spots. Maintenance of surfaces in kitchens is 
important to prevent growth of molds and other contaminants, and facilitates proper practices for sanitation to facilitate 
husbandry practices needed to support animal welfare. The facility must ensure housekeeping is sufficient to maintain 
cleanliness in the kitchen area. 
 
Correct by 03/31/2025

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
